attributes.action: Create a common unit that ties salaries, housing and utilities with inflation
attributes.additional_details: If we converted the current economic model to a fractal?Mandelbrot set like system, we would have a system where wages grow faster than the cost of housing and utilities, allowing us to have more money to spend on nice things, and as long as inflation exists and people are encouraged to live a happy life, the system will correct itself to create a stable social safety net for everybody and the need for strikes in healthcare, education, transportation and transportation will be over.
attributes.background: Read the blog post https://bar-kin.blog/2023/06/01/the-endgame/ and implement its methods completely

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The request of a petition needs to be set out clearly and in full in the text of a petition, not in linked documents.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
